0.user_question: Edward spent $ 9. Then he spent $ 8 more. Now he has $ 17. How much did Edward have before he spent his money?

ost_step.1: Edward ended up with $17 after spending.
ost_step.2: Before that, he spent $8 additionally, so he had $17+$8=$25 before that.
ost_step.3: Previously, he also spent $9, so he had $25+$9=$34 before those expenditures.
